completeListOfAbilities.name: Armor Shot
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered 3 times
Deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Ranged Resist Down 
Deals 20% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack
Moderately restores party's HP based on cumulative HP damage dealt to target
Recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
All targets: 4 turns Ranged Resist Down
Self: 6 turns Snipe

ailments.name: Ranged Resist Down
ailments.desc: Ranged Resist Down: Lowers resist to ranged attacks

ailments.name: Snipe
ailments.desc: Snipe: Raises own MAX BRV; raises party's ATK、 amount stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV with ranged BRV attacks (does not stack)

passives.name: Canister Shot Extension
passives.desc:
Canister Shot use +3

When using Canister Shot:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit
passives.short_desc: Canister Shot Extension: Boost to Canister Shot

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Scatter Shot Extension
passives.desc:
When using Scatter Shot:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Moderate Ranged Resist Down hit rate boost、 duration+
 • Self: 5 turns PHY ATK Up I

After using Scatter Shot:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (moderate BRV damage boost) for 5 turns
passives.short_desc: Scatter Shot Extension: Boost to Scatter Shot

passive.name: Debuff Act Longer Shot Growth
passive.desc: Debuff Act Longer Shot use +1\n\nDebuff Act Longer Shot effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Debuff Act Longer Shot Growth: Boost to Debuff Act Longer Shot

When using Canister Shot:
 • BRV damage boost
 • SPD Down boost、 duration+
 • Self: 4 turns MAX BRV Up I
passive.short_desc: Crack Shot: Boost to Canister Shot

passive.name: Shot Full of Feeling
passive.desc: Scatter Shot boost、 guaranteed hit\nRanged Resist Down hit rate+\nSelf: 3 turns BRV Regen

passives.name: Far-Off Memories HP+
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Bismarck (VIII) or passive ability Far-Off Memories:\n • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Far-Off Memories HP+: Enables HP Attack+

passive.name: Far-Off Memories Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Armor Shot
passive.short_desc: Far-Off Memories Extension: Boost to Armor Shot

passives.name: Armor Shot Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Armor Shot:\n • Tremendous BRV damage boost\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

passives.name: Far-Off Memories Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Bismarck (VIII)+ or passive ability Far-Off Memories Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 moderately raises ATK
passives.short_desc: Far-Off Memories Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Armor Shot Buff Starting Recast Up
passives.desc:
Slightly raises recast speed of Armor Shot

At start of quest:
 • Self: 6 turns Snipe
passives.short_desc: Armor Shot Buff Starting Recast Up: Boost to Armor Shot; Snipe at start of quest

passives.name: Armor Shot BRV Hit Plus Force Advance++
passives.desc:
When using Armor Shot:
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 3; tremendously increases cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (slight BRV damage boost; slightly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP)
passives.short_desc: Armor Shot BRV Hit Plus Force Advance++: Boost to Armor Shot; enables HP Attack++
